effect_entries.effect:
Held: Increases the holder's Special Attack by 50%, but restricts it to the first move it uses until it leaves battle or loses this item.  If this item is swapped for another Choice item via Trick or Switcheroo, the holder's restriction is still lifted, but it will again be restricted to the next move it uses.
(Quirk: If the holder is switched in by U-Turn and it also knows U-Turn, U-Turn becomes its restricted move.)
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Increases Special Attack by 50%, but restricts the holder to only one move.

flavor_text_entries.text:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. These
distinctive glasses boost Sp. Atk, but
allow only one kind of move to be used.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. These
distinctive glasses boost Sp. Atk, but
allow only one kind of move to be used.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. These
distinctive glasses boost Sp. Atk, but
allow only one kind of move to be used.

Objet à tenir augmentant l’Attaque
Spéciale, mais ne permettant d’utiliser
qu’une seule capacité par combat.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. These
distinctive glasses boost Sp. Atk but
allow the use of only one of its moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. These
distinctive glasses boost Sp. Atk but
allow the use of only one of its moves.

ちょっと　こだわった　メガネ。
もたせると　とくこうは　あがるが
おなじ　わざしか　だせなくなる。

기술을 구애받는 안경.
지니게 하면 특수공격이 올라가지만
같은 기술밖에 쓸 수 없다.

Objet à tenir. Augmente l’Attaque Spéciale,
mais ne permet d’utiliser qu’une seule capacité
par combat.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Die Brille erhöht den
Spezial-Angriff, aber nur eine Attacke
ist einsetzbar.

Incienso de exótico aroma que fortalece los
movimientos de tipo Psíquico. Debe llevarlo un
Pokémon.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Questi occhiali aumentano l’Attacco Speciale,
ma permettono l’uso di una sola mossa.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
These curious glasses boost Sp. Atk
but only allow the use of one move.

ちょっと　こだわった　メガネ。
持たせると　特攻は　あがるが
同じ　技しか　だせなくなる。

ちょっと　こだわった　メガネ。
もたせると　とくこうは　あがるが
おなじ　わざしか　だせなくなる。

기술을 구애받는 안경.
지니게 하면 특수공격이 올라가지만
같은 기술밖에 쓸 수 없다.

有點講究的眼鏡。
雖然攜帶後特攻會提高，
但只能使出相同的招式。

Objet à tenir. Augmente l’Attaque Spéciale,
mais ne permet d’utiliser qu’une seule capacité
par combat.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Die Brille erhöht den
Spezial-Angriff, aber nur eine Attacke ist
einsetzbar.

Aumentan la potencia de los ataques especiales
del Pokémon que las lleva, pero solo le permiten
usar un movimiento.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Questi occhiali aumentano la potenza delle mosse
speciali, ma permettono l’uso di una sola mossa.

glasses boost Sp. Atk but only allow the use of
one move.

持たせると　特攻は　あがるが

有点讲究的眼镜。
虽然携带后特攻会提高，
但只能使出相同的招式。
